m_szDocTitle: How Will Tesla (TSLA) Stock React to Michigan's Ban on Direct Sales? - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet How Will Tesla (TSLA) Stock React to Michigan's Ban on Direct Sales? By Tedd Cohen | 10/21/14 - 03:18 PM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) won't be able to open showrooms or directly sell its electric cars in Michigan under legislation that Governor Rick Snyder plans to sign that will formally block the sales method, Bloomberg reports. "This bill does not, as some have claimed, prevent auto manufacturers from selling automobiles directly to consumers at retail in Michigan -- because this is already prohibited under Michigan law," Snyder said in
